de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction

Interface IndexBasedDistanceFunction<O,D extends Distance<D>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DistanceFunction<O,D>, Parameterizable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FilteredLocalPCABasedDistanceFunction<O,P,D>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIndexBasedDistanceFunction, AbstractPreferenceVectorBasedCorrelationDistanceFunction, DiSHDistanceFunction, ERiCDistanceFunction, HiSCDistanceFunction, LocallyWeightedDistanceFunction, LocalSubspaceDistanceFunction, PCABasedCorrelationDistanceFunction, SharedNearestNeighborJaccardDistanceFunction

    public interface IndexBasedDistanceFunction<O,D extends Distance<D>>
extends DistanceFunction<O,D>
    Distance function relying on an index (such as preprocessed neighborhoods).
